EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for the Brand Company's Company's management control in order to send the invoice to Market Company
EmailTemplate.name: PJ ByFor Experience TEmail Notify to Send the Invoice to the subsidiary
EmailTemplate.subject: By&For: Invoice need to be sent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Management control,
You have to send an invoice to {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.OwnerFullName} for the Experience {!PJ_ByFor_Experience__c.Name}.
When it is done, please update the Experience: Link.
Kindest regards,
By&For Team
